meanings.definition: The quality or state of being excessively strict or moralistic in behavior or attitudes.
meanings.sent1: Her straitlacedness made it difficult for her to enjoy the party.
meanings.sent2: His straitlacedness often led to disagreements with his more easygoing friends.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show poked fun at the straitlacedness of the uptight character.
meanings.sent4: The artist's rebellious spirit clashed with the straitlacedness of the traditional art world.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's straitlacedness was legendary among the students.
